review: Listening to music on Pandora is wonderful.  Now that Plex allows non-monthly subscribers cast content that is on their media server to Chromecast, you could send any of your movies that you have in the Plex Media Server to Chromecast.  You do still need to pay for the Plex app. It is $5 so it is fairly inexpensive for the convenience of watching your media.  It would be nice if they integrated the Chromecast feature onto the server.  This way you would not have to go to your smartphone all of the time just to play your content.I am sure more apps will integrate with Chromecast, so the fun has only just begun.
author: Marcia Boivin
